title: ITP facilitation vans, PS on Wheels to serve at 28 locations across capital, Oct 13â€“19
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 13 (APP):Islamabad Traffic Police (ITP) has announced the schedule for its facilitation vans and the Police Station on Wheels (PS on Wheels), which will provide licensing services and others facilities at various locations across the capital from October 13 to 19, 2025, between 08:00am and 05:00pm.
An official told APP on Monday that ASI Younas (In-charge of Vans) may be contacted at 0317-1528717, while citizens can also call the Helpline 1915 for assistance.
PS on Wheels (IDP-1387, SI Asim Zaidi, 0300-5595681)
Van-I (GAG-709, Abdul Qadeer, 0300-2322883)
Van-II (GAC-656, Yasir Idrees, 0322-7100602)
Van-III (GD-896, Aqib Khan, 0320-5023304)
Van-II: Site Office, Jinnah Garden Phase-I
Van-I: Khayaban-e-Kashmir (G-15) Society Office
Services include learner permits, licence renewals, duplicate licences and international driving permits. Citizens are advised to bring original CNIC and required documents/fees. For queries or any change due to operational needs, tune in to FM 92.4 or call the contacts above.
